A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
My overriding feeling after seeing this was "This CAN'T be Episode 8! It just CAN'T be!" 

The fact that it totally ignored questions from Episode 7 is one reason it felt like a standalone film. 

It also killed off Luke\, while Leia is dead by proxy\, leaving it feeling like an end. 

Broom-kid at the end increased the impression that the story we'd been watching hitherto had been wrapped up.

For all its special effects and gigantic budget\, this was just Just poor\, poor filmmaking .
